text: Hasloch is a community in Main-Spessart in the Regierungsbezirk of Lower Franconia (Unterfranken) in Bavaria, Germany and a member of the Verwaltungsgemeinschaft of Kreuzwertheim. Hasloch has a population of about 1,400. ==Geography== ===Location=== Hasloch is on the river Main in the Würzburg region. The river at this point is the border between Bavaria and Baden-Württemberg. Hasloch is on the southern edge of the Mittelgebirge Spessart. The Haslochbach flows into the Main east of the village. ===Subdivisions=== The community has the following Gemarkungen (traditional rural cadastral areas): Hasloch and Hasselberg. ==References== ==Other websites== * Municipal website * Eisenhammer museum Category:Main-Spessart
title: Hasloch
